price: pé ẹ jí lọ sí oko yín tí ẹ bá fẹ́ ká èso.
arabic: أَنِ ٱغۡدُواْ عَلَىٰ حَرۡثِكُمۡ إِن كُنتُمۡ صَٰرِمِينَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: ani igh'dū ʿalā ḥarthikum in kuntum ṣārimīna
